name: Wukong

sources.import_notes: Generated baseline canonical champion file from From Online dataset.

notes: Ability effects are intentionally minimal placeholders until scripted modeling is added.

passive.name: Stone Skin
passive.description: Innate:  Wukong gains  bonus armor based on level and  health regeneration equal to a portion of his maximum health.
passive.description_source: Stacks of Strength of Stone are also granted  on-hit, but will specifically not be if the target is  invulnerable.

basic_ability_1.name: Crushing Blow
basic_ability_1.description: Active:  Wukong's next basic attack within a few seconds will gain  bonus range, deal bonus physical damage, and inflict  armor reduction for a short time.
basic_ability_1.description_source:
Crushing Blow triggers on  structures and  wards but the armor reduction is not applied.
Issuing a Hold command (default J) or Stop command (default S) after Crushing Blow's attack has started will cancel the animation, however the attack will still be launched and Wukong will be unable to move until that point.

basic_ability_2.name: Warrior Trickster
basic_ability_2.description: Active:  Wukong enters brief  invisibility and  dashes to the target location, leaving behind a  clone for a short time.
basic_ability_2.description_source:
Casting Warrior Trickster during an ability's effects will transfer them to the clone.
 Turret shots instantly kill the clone.
The clone is immune to  stasis and  Blast Cone.
The clone can still be targeted by allied  auto-targeted effects (e.g.  Heal,  Celestial Blessing).
Using a basic attack breaks the stealth at the end of the attack windup.

basic_ability_3.name: Nimbus Strike
basic_ability_3.description: Active:  Wukong  dashes to the target enemy and sends  untargetable clones to briefly attack up to two surrounding enemies, dealing magic damage.
basic_ability_3.description_source:
The clones can block non-targeted attacks or abilities for 0.25 seconds after hitting their targets. [2] (note)
Casting Nimbus Strike interrupts the attack windup of enemies targeting Wukong.(bug)
Nimbus Strike has an offset distance of 75 units from the target dashed to.
The ability applies a stack of  Electrocute /  Phase Rush even if the target is  untargetable.

ultimate.name: Cyclone
ultimate.description: Active:  Wukong spins his staff around for a short time, becoming  ghosted and gaining  bonus movement speed. The staff continually deals physical damage to enemies hit based on their maximum health, and can briefly  knock them up once.
ultimate.description_source:
Cyclone is special cased to grant stacks of  Conqueror for each tick of damage.
Casting a basic ability will always interrupt Wukong's Cyclone. A clone can be interrupted by casting  Crushing Blow, but only if the clone was made during the current Cyclone cast and only for that cast. This means if both Wukong and his clone are spinning, the clone cannot be interrupted.
Cyclone's remaining duration always stays the same even after the clone replicated the ability.
During Cyclone, Wukong and his clone's  attack ranges are reduced[ to 50 ][ by 125 ].
 Spell shield will block one instance of damage.
Blocking the  knock up will still grant immunity to it from either of Cyclone's casts.
